website_summaries.verdict: A basic but durable set of bore bars that is perfect for beginning machinists and hobbyists.
pros: Small boring bars make it easy to create tight or narrow bore holes in dense materials
Steel construction offers plenty of machining use before starting to dull or break
cons: The set lacks the necessary inserts
Will need to grind down the bore bars for the best fit on most machines

customer_reviews.title: This product is negative rake.
customer_reviews.text: Inserts are sharp and contain chipbreakers, but the boring bars have about a -7 degree rake angle to them. I tend to hop around on materials, but I've always used a positive rake angle on my homemade tools. I guess I'll just have to see how they do.
customer_reviews.author: MotokoU

customer_reviews.title: That I Am buying quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Just a truly oarthumb set of boring bars for light to medium work,My only complaint would be that the screw fastener that holds the insert in its correct position is too short, it does not make full use of the threaded section in the body of the boring bar,which could result in the thread housing becoming stripped over time if too much tension was put on the key wrench.
customer_reviews.author: ivan Vegar

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is really great. I am impressed with the quality for the low price. These boring bars are comparable to the high dollar ones. I definitely would recommend these to anyone. I didn't look too close when I first used one on aluminum. Set up in my lathe and started cutting and was having trouble getting a smooth finish....... then realized I didn't have an insert installed, Ha Ha!! The bar was still rigid enough to make a cut. Worked perfect with an insert. Try them, you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H. Eimer

customer_reviews.title: Good boring bars in 3 sizes, all have inserts installed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact you can get good to great bore surfaces with these alone. Aluminum gets the best raw finish but cast iron needs some honing to get the best finish. The bars are very stiff so they run true. Just keep your cutting depths shallow to start with and add a little more depth when you feel the bar can handle it. Overall these are a great set of bars and inserts. Happy I bought thsee for my HF 9x20 lathe. These will also work on the HF 7" lathe.
customer_reviews.author: Outback Joe

customer_reviews.title: Small lite duty boring bar set for my small lathe
customer_reviews.text: I have not put a lot of time in on these boring bars but so far so good. Not a bad set for the price. I also bought a turning tool to use the unused side of the inserts to get more out of them
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: dis-satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that they let these products leave the plant. 1 screw was missing and the screws go past the bar so it catches your work piece, plus the inserts are not properly cut correctly. I will never buy anything tool from china again.
customer_reviews.author: William David Ludolph

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but good set of boring bars
customer_reviews.text: These are small insert boring bars the set has the size range for most home shop projects. These are good but not for heavy cuts as long as you are reasonable about the depth of cut these will work fine. You cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Lesa Young

customer_reviews.title: Smaller  borring bars so I can get into small holes...indexed cutters are  good too !
customer_reviews.text: My normal boring bar didn't go small enough for some special projects so ordered this. Good selection of sizes for small holes. I wasn't expecting the replaceable indexed inserts to be anything special but they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: AstroBob

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Lots of additional cutting inserts. Which is good, because they seem to be hard to find without the set.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little boring bar set for small lathes. I was able to bore some pretty decent holes with these things. Only reason for 4 stars is because the carbide inserts do not break a chip very well. They string off long spirals, but they do leave a rather nice surface finish. Machined about 8" of 2" diameter round bar into just about nothing and the insert looked brand new and had a very sharp edge still. Overall, I'm definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to cut aluminum just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for what I needed it to do, to bore short depth holes into aluminum while on my lathe. I thought I had ordered 2 boring arms and that’s what I received. Maybe they are shipping with 3 now, because that is what’s shown in the pic. ? Either way I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: I Buy thru Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap set
customer_reviews.text: Work well, factory inserts aren’t great in steel but do work. I was expecting this and will get better ones when the need arises. I work in 75% aluminum and soft metals so ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Valliere

customer_reviews.title: I use an Armstrong style tool holder so I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I use an Armstrong style tool holder so I had to turn the bars down to fit but no big deal. That is the only reason for 4 stars. Other than that they work and inserts were included.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I have used the largest bar on stainless and am ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the largest bar on stainless and am impressed with the cut and performance of this tool for the money. This tool isn't for hogging material but works well for bringing holes to odd sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter/ backup set
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these you can not go wrong. I turned out several projects removing confidently 30 thou passes with no issue and having a consistent finish.
customer_reviews.author: martin houston

customer_reviews.title: Great set of boring bars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and performance of this indexable boring cutter set. I bought quality inserts but did not need to replace the ones that came with the cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Galsim

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tool for the home machinists. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: michelled

customer_reviews.title: Came on time ,works fine
customer_reviews.text: I have only used one of them and it work just fine , I’m not a professional but as a hobbyists it work just fine, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Al Van Antwerp

customer_reviews.title: The cutters are kind of amazing
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these boring bars are much much better than expected. The little cutters that come with them are surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Colt Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY DOLLAR
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, especially for the price. Great addition to my shop tools. Not something one would use everyday (being small) but will definitely get you out of a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle n.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does as expected but service from the supplier was best and made this purchase and excellent experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bonner

customer_reviews.title: junk  Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: One bit broke the other carrier bent. Junk. Dont wast your money here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smaller boring bars I had to grind down the insert bolts .
customer_reviews.author: Roly Harter

customer_reviews.title: Good for light duty and small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Did some serious boring on aluminum with one of these and it held up. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yellowjacket

customer_reviews.title: Works well with AXA tool post and holder
customer_reviews.text: Nice set - works well - using on old Craftsman 12" and it eliminated chatter when used with AXA quick change tool post.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 3 are usable!
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 out of three was usable. On the smallest. tightening the screw caused the insert to go from flat to having a ~1mm gap rendering it useless. It was of a different brand than the larger bars (which should work well). I contacted the seller who gave me some choices to fix it but I have'nt heard back from him if replacing the bad one was ok. Overall still not a bad deal butI'd have spent more and had 3 working bars. If 2 out of 3 is OK these are what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Watson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a "boring" job fun
customer_reviews.text: Good chatter free cut, nice surface finish. A really "Boring" job done well. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: No inserts came with. Threads extend past bottom of bar. Will need to grind down. You get what you pay for. Decent inserts aren't cheap anyways. Will see how much DOC these will take and what chatter if any happens
customer_reviews.author: Tactidude

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used yet but they seem to be good think they will work fine
customer_reviews.author: Rcm

product_meta.title: SCLCR Lathe Boring Internal Turning Bar Holder + 10 Pcs CCMT0602 Insert + 3 Pcs Wrench
product_meta.description:
Specifications: 

 Shank D: 
S07K-SCLCR06: 7mm/0.27'' 
S10K-SCLCR06: 10mm/0.39'' 
S12M-SCLCR06: 12mm/0.46'' 


 Overall L: 
S07K-SCLCR06: 125mm/4.92'' 
S10K-SCLCR06: 125mm/4.92'' 
S12M-SCLCR06: 150mm/5.91'' 

 Lead cutting angle: 95 degree 
Direction: right hand 

 Notice: 
1. Please allow 1-3cm error due to manual measurement. Please make sure you do not mind before you bid. 
2. The color may have different as the difference display, Please understand. 

 Package Included: 
1 x S07K-SCLCR06 Boring Bar 
1 x S10K-SCLCR06 Boring Bar 
1 x S12M-SCLCR06 Boring Bar 
10 x CCMT0602 Insert 
3 x Wrench
feature_bullets: ◥Three Indexable Boring Bar: including S07K-SCLCR06, S10K-SCLCR06, S12M-SCLCR06
◥High quality Steel Durable for Long Time Use: Imported main part, the bar holder adopts imported 40Cr material

◥Lead Cutting Angle: 95 Degree, Direction: Right Hand,Insert: CCMT0602, Clear mark on the wrench, easy to identify bar holder, comes with individual package, packed in polyethylene box with mark on the box
◥Widely Use: Tightly impacted bolt, simple structure, often used for small hole machining.
◥What You Get: Yosoo 3pc SCLCR lathe boring bar set, 10pcs CCMT0602 Inserts, 3pcs Wrench and carry box, Yosoo worry free guarantee and friendly customer service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
